title: Raid Boss
desc:
Post 720
- When played, this card goes in your identity zone.
- When played, If you lose, everyone else wins.
- On your turn, gain 2 muscle.
- On your turn, you may discard a card if you have more then 2 cards.
- When played, negative cards played by a player thats not you that target a player thats not you that are also negative target you.
- Every turn, you may swap a card in your hand with a random hostile card.
- All your cards are also <:wild:1106237191388143838> for the purpose of playing them on other cards. If you play a card on a card you canâ€™t normally play it on, lose all muscle.
